messages.message:
Hi Team,
I am just trying out classification. Do we support classification based on text only or through Visual as well ?
There is no text in this image. I guess that is the reason why it is not able to classify this image into *"Products"* class.
cc : @Nithin @Anshu

Hi Balusa, classification through visual reasoning is not yet supported :confused: cc: @Kaustubh (KD)
Might need to decide soon on an approach to

1. implement and enable visual classification
2. propagate an arbitrary field response to a Class as a more generic way?
Let me create an explicit ticket for visual classification, but for number 2 you are just saying to use the field output as a proxy for classification in AI Hub right?
